definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְנִסְפְּחוּ עַל־]] consec. Is 14:1 and they shall attach themselves to the house of Jacob (‖[[נִלְוָה]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְסַפֵּהַ חֲסָֽתְְ]] Hb Hab 2:15 joining (to it ?) thy fury, but read prob. [[מִסַּף]] ([[ךְ]] dittogr.) from the goblet of thy fury (so We Gr Now GASm Da).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְסֻפָָּחוּ]] Job 30:7 are joined together, hold themselves together (yet rd. perh. Niph. [[יִסָּפֵָחוּ]] Bu).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[מֵהִסְתַּפֵּחַ]] 1Sa 26:19 they have driven me out from joining myself with ([[בְּ]]) the inheritance of ´[[י]].
